image-alt-text: Man with wine glasses in La Dame de Pic London booth while sommelier introduces bottle of white wine
name: Exclusive Château Latour Tasting Led by our Award-Winning Director of Wine
description: Join award-winning Director of Wine Jan Konetzki on a journey of discovery through the world-renowned Château Latour estate’s most precious vintages.

map.location: Four Seasons Hotel London at Ten Trinity Square
map.address: 10 Trinity Square, Tower, London EC3N 4AJ, United Kingdom

additionalService.text: Luxury vehicles: Mercedes Benz S-Class or vintage Rolls Royce

highlights: Awarded the title of the UK’s “Sommelier of the Year” on four occasions, Director of Wine Jan Konetzki is recognized as one of the world's most distinguished Sommeliers and will lead you on a journey of unprecedented insights, guided by his outstanding sensory talent.

Dating back to the 14th century, Chateau Latour is the world’s most prestigious Bordeaux wine estate, offering you a unique opportunity to explore their award-winning vintages in the very first Château Latour Discovery Room, located in our members only Private Club.

Enjoy exclusive access to the spectacular surroundings of the Ten Trinity Square Private Club, the finest of its kind in The City, where you will be personally greeted by Jan and his dedicated team of sommeliers for a truly remarkable Four Seasons experience.

Uncover a unique culinary vision inspired by three generations of French gastronomy, as you savour bespoke canapés specially created by three Michelin-star chef Anne-Sophie Pic, Executive Chef at our innovative La Dame du Pic restaurant.

concierge.name: Jan Konetzki
concierge.title: Director of Wine
concierge.quote: There is nothing I love more than sharing my passion with guests. It’s so much more than just tasting the wines, it’s the shared experience that they will take home with them.

name: Private Borough Market Tour and Michelin-Starred masterclass
description: Join two Michelin-star Head Chef Luca Piscazzi on an exclusive tour of historic Borough Market, before a private cooking master class at La Dame du Pic.
highlights: Discover what drives legendary Chef Anne-Sophie Pic’s unique and personal culinary perspective, with a memorable behind-the-scenes tour of Ten Trinity’s two Michelin-starred restaurant, La Dame du Pic, personally guided by Head Chef Luca Piscazzi.

Travel with Chef Luca to historic Borough Market in true London fashion, by traditional black cab, exploring the atmospheric brick archways and bustling stalls of London’s oldest food market, which has been revolutionizing the city’s culinary scene since 1851.

Fostering close-knit and lasting relationships with many of the local producers, Chef Luca will introduce you to his most trusted suppliers, who provide the world-class seasonal produce that is the inspiration for many of La Dame du Pic’s most inventive creations.

Return to La Dame du Pic for an Michelin-starred master class in the art of sophisticated French cuisine, as you work closely alongside Chef Luca, learning innovative and unexpected new techniques in order to create an unforgettable two course meal together.

concierge.name: Chef Luca Piscazzi
concierge.title: La Dame de Pic London Head Chef
concierge.quote: Borough Market is a culinary melting pot, where all the flavours of the world come together in an incredible harmony.

map.location: Four Seasons Hotel London at Ten Trinity Square
map.address: 8 Southwark St, London SE1 1TL, United Kingdom

additionalService.text: Luxury vehicles: Mercedes Benz S-Class or vintage Rolls Royce

itinerary.title: La Dame de Pic kitchen tour
itinerary.description: Begin at La Dame de Pic for a kitchen for a tour, as well as coffee, pastries and menu discussion.

itinerary.title: Classic London Black cab ride
itinerary.description: Accompanied by Chef Luca, ride in a classic London black cab to Borough Market.

itinerary.title: Borough Market
itinerary.description: Explore Borough Market, sourcing ingredients from local vendors.

itinerary.title: Return to Four Seasons
itinerary.description: Transfer back to Four Seasons Hotel at Ten Trinity Square

itinerary.title: Cooking masterclass with chef luca
itinerary.description: In La Dame de Pic, attend a cooking masterclass with Chef Luca using the ingedients sourced from Borough Market. Enjoy your final dishes as well as dessert provided by the hotel pastry team.

name: The Secrets of the Real Downton Abbey and Private High Tea
description: Join the eighth Countess of Carnarvon for an exclusive personalized tour of remarkable Highclere Castle – the real-life location of Downtown Abbey.
highlights: Experience a unique immersion in centuries-old artwork and historic Jacobethan-style architecture, as you join Lady Carnarvon herself for a private tour of this traditional English stately home and its estate, away from the general public.

Married to the Earl of Carnarvon for over 20 years, the Countess has the privilege of running one of the world’s most iconic and instantly-recognizable houses and will welcome you into her home for a one-of-a-kind experience, available exclusively to Four Seasons.

Be transported back in time, as the Countess introduces you to centuries-old works of art, architecture and the priceless antiques of her family’s predecessors, along with unprecedented access to iconic settings from award-winning series Downton Abbey.

Gain unique and memorable insight into the daily workings of an English country castle, as you accompany Highclere’s Head Gardener [Full Name] on a personal tour of the pristine landscaped gardens and native woodlands of this remarkable 5,000-acre estate.

Round off this unique Four Seasons experience by gazing up at bespoke portraits of Charles I and the Carnarvon ancestors, as you enjoy unprecedented access to the Castle’s State Rooms for a traditional English high tea, expertly served by your private butler.

options.title: Option 1
options.subTitle: Coach House
descriptions: Enjoy traditional high-tea overlooking the grounds in the Coach House.

options.title: Option 2
options.subTitle: State Room
descriptions: Experience private butler service and traditional high-tea in Highclere’s elegant State Rooms.

concierge.name: Chris Sheridan
concierge.title: Head Historian at Highclere Castle
concierge.quote: It’s like taking a step back in time and immersing yourself in the unmatched beauty of the architecture. It will take your breath away.

map.address: Highclere Park Highclere, Newbury RG20 9RN, United Kingdom

additionalService.text: Luxury vehicles: Mercedes Benz S-Class or vintage Rolls Royce

name: Private Crown Jewels and Luxury Boat Trip Through the Heart of London
description: Join a Yeoman Warder guard for a guided tour of the world-famous Crown Jewels, before a private boat trip and champagne breakfast on the River Thames.
highlights: Be personally greeted at Ten Trinity by a traditional Yeoman Warder guard in full uniform, who will delight you with unique insider stories about the local area as you make the short walk past Tower Hill and the River Thames for a private tour of the Tower.

Explore over 1,000 years of British history accompanied by your Beefeater guide, meeting the World Heritage site’s famous ravens before marvelling at the magnificent Crown Jewels and royal regalia used by Queen Elizabeth II, before the Jewel House opens to the public.

Your guide will then escort you to the Tower’s private pier, as we welcome you aboard for a private boat trip along the iconic River Thames, taking in unparalleled views of its most famous sights, such as Tower Bridge, the Houses of Parliament and the London Eye.

Raise a toast to the most exclusive of Four Seasons experiences, as you savour a sophisticated champagne breakfast and gourmet catering platter along the river, prepared especially for your trip by London’s most luxurious department store, Harrods.

concierge.name: Lori Daley
concierge.title: Tower of London Curator
concierge.quote: Get up close and personal to arguably the most admired collection of precious stones. This is a truly one-of-a-kind experience, stepping behind the velvet rope in such a revered historic setting, and one our guests cherish for years to come.

map.location: Four Seasons Hotel London at Park Lane
map.address: St Katharine's & Wapping, London EC3N 4AB, United Kingdom

name: Private Boat Ride Along the English Country Estate Canal
image-alt-text: Family on canal boat Louise rides along forest-lined river
description: Step aboard our private canal boat and explore the charming countryside of our Hampshire estate, paired with champagne and luxurious canapés.
highlights: Experience the grandeur of a traditional English manor estate, as you sail through 500-acres of private countryside aboard our luxury canal boat.
Spot wild deer and native wildfowl as you sip champagne along the historic waterways, constructed by then-Lord of the Manor Sir Henry Mildmay in 1798.
Return for an exploration of classic British cuisine at Wild Carrot restaurant, with a 3-course meal infused by ingredients sourced from local farms and markets.

concierge.name: Jaime Baker
concierge.title: Events Coordinator, Hampshire
concierge.quote: There is something quite special about seeing England's glorious countryside whilst meandering along our historic canals.

map.address: Dogmersfield Park, Chalky Ln, Dogmersfield, Hook RG27 8TD, United Kingdom
map.availability: A minimum 48 hours notice required for this booking

additionalService.text: Luxury vehicles: Mercedes Benz S-Class or vintage Rolls Royce

name: Private Wine Tour and Lunch with Award-Winning Vineyard Founder
description: Head to the heart of the English countryside to join award-winning wine producers Coates & Seely for an immersion in the best of British wine and food.
highlights: An Experience exclusive to Four Seasons, award-winning winery Coates & Seely will provide your private group with unprecedented access to their estate, for An immersive Experience in all things relating to British wine and cuisine that is not available to the public.

Take in the picturesque English countryside, as founder and wine connoisseur Nicholas Coates personally guides you around the vineyards and winery, outlining the terroir on which the grapes are grown and why it is crucial to the quality of the wine.

Listed in royal palaces and Michelin-starred restaurants, revel in the unique experiences and stories behind each one of Coates & Seeley’s award-winning creations, with An immersive wine tasting session expertly matched with locally-sourced food-pairings.

Round off your unique Four Seasons Experience with a spectacular Four-course lunch or dinner in the Dining Room at Northington House, with a curated menu prepared by Nicholas Coates’ wife Virginia, a trained Chef with a passion for innovative British cuisine.

concierge.name: Nicholas Coates
concierge.title: Co-owner of Coates & Seeley
concierge.quote: It all started with a dream - to make one day a word-beating sparkling wine on the chalk downlands of southern England - and a decade on our wines are now served in royal palaces, Michelin-starred restaurants and iconic houses around the world.

map.availability: A minimum of two weeks notice required for this booking. Lunch:  11am - 3pm Dinner:  6pm - 10pm

additionalService.text: Luxury vehicles: Mercedes Benz S-Class or vintage Rolls Royce

itinerary.title: Vineyard and Winery tour
itinerary.description: Embark on the Vineyard and Winery tour a with a ‘birds eye’ view of the vineyards.  Nicholas Coates, co-owner of Coates & Seely, outlines the ‘terroir’ on which the grapes are grown, and the wine making process.

itinerary.title: Sparkling wine tasting
itinerary.description: Stop for a tasting of Coates & Seely sparkling wines with canapes, made from locally sourced ingredients, which compliments each wine pairing.

itinerary.title: Lunch
itinerary.description: Enjoy a delicious lunch, prepared by Virginia Coates.
